entry.title: Sublysis
entry.summary:
Author: RubiesareforHunting

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,826Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 227

Summary: Merlin is a great detective. They call him Magic, for a reason. But when Arthur Pendragon realizes that the famous detective who has been plaguing his criminal organization for five years, is designated Submissive…well. All’s fair in love and war. At an impasse where both of them will do anything it takes to keep the other one from revealing their secrets, the only way to survive might just be a truce that neither of their organizations can know about.Mutually assured destruction never felt so good.

entry.title: Gave me a Key and Called it Home (Hogwarts is my home)
entry.summary:
Author: MalfunctioningMentallyUnstableBookworm

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,241Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Harry Potter had never made friends at school. But when a boy showed up in his class in fourth grade on the second to last day of school, who hid his bruises the same as he did, Harry wanted a friend. Nathaniel Wesninski had run with his mother away from his father. He was placed in a school in Little Whinging while his mother figured out what they were gonna do. When they both get chosen to play on the Hogwarts Foxes, the all school quidditch team that competes with other schools the boys become friends. So naturally when shit goes down and Harry can protect them he does, which lands them in the 1940s.

entry.title: and when I run low, you fill me up
entry.summary:
Author: Shana_Rose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,634Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 17

Summary: The door opened with a click. He held his breath, was it Pendragon?A man about the same height as Merlin came through the door. The man was, frankly, utterly gorgeous. Blond and broad-shouldered in a perfectly tailored suit. His cropped beard was the only thing about him that didn’t quite fit his clean-cut look, but Merlin didn’t mind, on the contrary, he rather liked the rugged feeling it gave the man.-To take down Uther and his evil corporation, Merlin takes on a mission as a sex worker to seduce his son, Arthur Pendragon but things don't go quite as planned.

entry.summary:
Author: iJoke

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,830Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 69

Summary: When Merlin first gets to Camelot and sees the king chop off someone’s head, he thinks that perhaps someone should do something about that. When he gets called by the dragon locked in the king’s basement, he thinks someone should do something about that pretty quickly. When the revenge of the executed man’s mother doesn’t take out two dozen innocent people as collateral damage to the king only because he intervenes, he remembers that he is, in fact, someone and is, according to Gaius, pretty powerful. entry.summary:
Author: Zuckmai_dek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,699Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: I'm going to be honest I haven't actually finished merlin, but I'm new to the fandom and wanted to dip my toes into the fanfic side. I was inspired from the line in skyward sword and think it would be a cool explanation for Merlin being the chosen one. There will probably be more in this AU because I like the idea so much, but I just wanted to start simple. I haven't written in a while. entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: ReyloTrash2187

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,129Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 256

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life untouched—by kindness, by desire, or anything resembling real intimacy. It never mattered. Not until a certain annoying manservant came to Camelot—Merlin—who disregarded all strict royal etiquette and showed no restraint when it came to sudden, reckless displays of affection. Now, there’s something impossible in the space between them, something Arthur doesn’t know how to name—only that he aches to close the distance.*A slow-burn touched-starved Arthur Pendragon story.*Guys, there was only one bed.Guys, some obscure quest in the cold far-up mountains made them "huddle for warmth".Guys, they might give in to this farm fantasy of theirs.Can't I just put all the tropes in there?This fic is rated MSI for Maximum Self Indulgence.

entry.title: Don’t Let Me Down
entry.summary:
Author: RubiesareforHunting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 193,571Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 459

Summary: Merlin is at rock bottom again, but this time it isn’t his fault. He thinks he should be winning awards at this point, for how low he could possibly get before getting any lower. So when the most affluent businessman in London proposes a six month plan to fix both of their problems, how could he say no? Arthur is cocky and irritating and Merlin’s temper isn’t making the plan go any easier, but even Merlin thinks Arthur’s crazy idea just might work. He’ll make it work if it kills him.…or he falls in love.Whichever comes first.
